ygData.subject: Re: Um actully i got items
ygData.msgSnippet: yup, i am positive that these two are the same person. if he is for real, he would meet us in the game some where and give us this great stuff. he does not
ygData.messageBody:
yup, i am positive that these two are the same
person. if he is for real, he would meet us in the game
some where and give us this great stuff. he does not
need our passwords to do this. do not send this guy
anything. <br><br>elryche<br>42 barbarian
shaman<br><br>p.s. there should be an e-mail address to report this
kind of stuff to sony/verent. does any one know what
it is? all we have to do is send them a link to the
origanal post and they will track him down.
